mapper.select: SELECT M.IDX AS IDX , U.ID AS ID , U.STATUS AS STATUS , M.NAME AS NAME , M.MOBILE AS MOBILE , M.POST AS POST , M.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS , M.ADDRESSDETAIL AS ADDRESSDETAIL , M.GRADE AS GRADE , M.POINT AS POINT , M.EMAIL AS EMAIL FROM T_USER U INNER JOIN T_MEMBER M ON (U.IDX=M.IDX) WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY M.IDX DESC
